verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: this week] [ARG1: that he has the right to pardon himself from possible crimes related to Russian meddling into the 2016 elections] .

President Trump said this week that [ARG0: he] has the right to [V: pardon] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: from possible crimes related to Russian meddling into the 2016 elections] .
President Trump said this week that he has the right to pardon himself from [ARG1: possible crimes] [V: related] [ARG2: to Russian meddling into the 2016 elections] .
